snippet: The police said the man, who was armed, had demanded that a group of men give over their motorcycle keys when the off-duty officer shot him in the head.
abstract: Off-duty Corrections Officer Alfredo Perez shoots and kills armed man who demanded that Perez and four others hand over keys to their motorcycles; incident occurred outside members-only motorcycle club NWO Clubhouse in Ozone Park, Queens.
lead_paragraph: The police said the man, who was armed, had demanded that a group of men give over their motorcycle keys when the off-duty officer shot him in the head.

headline.main: Corrections Officer Kills Man During Attempted Robbery in Queens
headline.print_headline: Off-Duty Officer Kills Man Attempting Motorcycle Robbery
